Generation VI.X: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.
Generation VI.Y: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Its happy-go-lucky look is an act intended to fool its enemies. It will suddenly drop the facade and overwhelm its foes with its blinding speed.
Generation IX.Violet: It utilizes its extraordinary jumping abilities to flummox its foes, throwing springy bubbles at them from above their heads.

Generation VI.X: First partner Pokémon from Tierno in Aquacorde Town Traded from Shauna in Vaniville Town after becoming Champion if the player chose Chespin
Generation VI.Y: First partner Pokémon from Tierno in Aquacorde Town Traded from Shauna in Vaniville Town after becoming Champion if the player chose Chespin

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Coastal Biome (after boosting biodiversity in the Coastal Biome)
